description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Grandmaster at Arms</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Grandmaster at Arms.
Auto-Equip: The Light of Icathia.
levelupDescription: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage.
flavorText: Centuries ago, Jax lost his homeland to the Void. Now, he travels the world, searching for warriors with the strength of will--and the sheer gall--to one day stand against that terrible foe.
name: Jax

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The World Ender</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>World Ender</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The World Ender.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a World Ender in hand if you don't have one.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played World Ender.
flavorText: Even across continents, Aatrox felt her awakening. How the hatred still burned. He had already broken her statues, now he could wage a final war against the Coward of Icathia, and through destroying her, end this pitiful existence.
name: Aatrox

description:
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: If my bearer is not a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Xolaani</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Last Breath: If my bearer is not a Darkinthrall, summon a Darkinthrall.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as Xolaani.
flavorText: As the fighting raged on, Jun, desperate and badly wounded, turned to the voice whispering in her thoughts. "You will never die," it said, soft as summer rain, "because I will never let you."
name: The Darkin Bloodletters

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it Fleeting.
flavorText:
"Oh dear, sounds like rain."
"Huh? Dad, it's so bright outside."
"Quick, cover the blueprints! It's a BRAINstorm!"
"Daaaaad."
- Seraphine & her father
name: Inspired Plans

description: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"Location: Sector 3, Underway 19B
Item: Illegal Firearm
Notes: Confiscated during Operation: Sumplight. Weapon is highly dangerous. Handle with extreme care."
- Piltover Warden field report
name: Gatalyst v1.0

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Reaper</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Shadow Reaper.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> twice.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck twice. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: As another body fell, Kayn let out a gleeful laugh, knowing that he would soon unleash the second Darkin weapon that lay below. Within him, Rhaast's anticipation grew, knowing that Kayn’s undoing was finally near.
name: Kayn

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Rune Mage</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Rune Mage.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see 3+ unique World Runes.
flavorText: Ryze crested the ridge, accompanied by Kayle's silent servant. He looked down on a land scarred by war, and caught sight of the darkin monstrosities warring below. For centuries, he had watched on as humanity veered from one catastrophe to another. What if, he thought, his efforts were futile, and Runeterra was doomed to die?"
name: Ryze

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Naganeka of Zuretta</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Naganeka of Zuretta.
flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link>. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Praa the Breachwalker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Summon an attacking Dragonling. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as Praa the Breachwalker.
flavorText: "In the bridge between worlds, I have long sensed a shadow that pulses with silent rage. Though I know better than to delve into the darkness after it, the pulse has lately grown stronger, faster--and I fear  the creatures of the spirit realm will soon begin searching for it." - Shen
name: The Darkin Fan

description: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Flow: I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "Blade and body." - Master Yi
name: Soul Sword

description:
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Horazi</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Horazi.
flavorText: Perhaps those who imprisoned the Darkin thought that burying the legendary warrior Horazi within an orb of star metal would sufficiently dim her irascible will. But as her general stirred, so too did Horazi, who found that even Targon's ancient protectors could be tempted by promises whispered from afar.
name: The Darkin Lodestone

flavorText: The standard sword and shield of choice for Demacia's helmeted brothers-in-arms.
name: Demacian Steel

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Anaakca</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Anaakca.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened. The Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"Do not listen to him, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel east. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

flavorText: "Crunch!" - Tarkaz the Tribeless
name: Bone Club

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I cost 2 less.
flavorText:
"Like the saying goes, nothin' ends a Bilgewater quarrel faster than a cutlass."
"Except maybe a pistol."
"Shut up, Baz."
- Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jagged Cutlass

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Spawn 2.
flavorText: "Stand strong beneath Her gaze!" - Illaoi
name: Eye of God

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Wandering Caretaker</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Wandering Caretaker.
Attack: Plant 3 Chimes in your deck.
levelupDescription: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by <nobr>20+.<style=Variable></style></nobr>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by 20+.
flavorText: "Aye, Old Gaff's seen his share o' strange! First time was the Caretaker 'imself, I reckon. Like a star streamin' 'cross the sky, he was. Felt like the whole world stopped a minute, and it was just me 'n' him…" - Old Gaff’s tale, part 1
name: Bard

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Virtuoso</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Virtuoso. 
Attack: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 12+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills.
flavorText: "Overture: We open on the city of Qayanvi, where an old master summons a young pupil. He is tasked with disposing a group of nefarious villains and recovering stolen sacred artifacts. The actor is keen, but he does not as yet take his place. For now he simply prepares, waiting in the wings."
name: Jhin

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Agony's Embrace</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Agony's Embrace.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
levelupDescription: When I see you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When I see you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
flavorText: The priestess' pupils were blown wide, and her hand trembled with nervous excitement. She was ready. This was the single moment Evelynn craved more than any other. She grinned, and slowly shed her visage. Then, as always, the screaming began.
name: Evelynn

description: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and Elusive.
flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
name: Swole Scout

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo
name: Puffcap Pup

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
name: Wizened Wizard

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round or grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give me Barrier this round or grant me Impact.
flavorText: The Blastcone Seedlings are shy creatures, and while they will retreat first and foremost, if threatened...
name: Blastcone Seedling

description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
flavorText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.
name: Bandle City Mayor

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 5+ multi-region allies.
flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
name: Tristana

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
flavorText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Poro Sled

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Spear</style></link> or a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Shield</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
flavorText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"
name: Yordle Squire

description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Mirror Mage

description: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavorText: "Worst. Trip. Ever." - Elle
name: Aloof Travelers

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks.
flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
name: Ziggs

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier or SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "I'll protect you with my wild and furious... meow!" - Yuumi
name: Friendship!

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game.
flavorText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.
name: The Bandle Tree

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it survives, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
flavorText: "Move it!" - Poppy
name: Heroic Charge

description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
descriptionRaw: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
flavorText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.
name: Stress Defense

description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mini-Minitee</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
flavorText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar
name: Minimorph

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7
name: Otterpus

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. <style=Variable></style>
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
flavorText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.
name: The Arsenal

description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
flavorText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19
name: Tricksy Tentacles

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Megatee</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Megatee.
flavorText: Things minitees like: napping on the warm summerstones beside the Nakotak tribal lands. Things minitees do not like: being shoved off said summerstones by cheeky yordles...
name: Minitee

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
levelupDescription: I or the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to have attacked 3 times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I or the unit I'm Attached to have attacked 3 times.
flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
name: Yuumi

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've attacked with allies 3 times.
flavorText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.
name: Poppy

description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavorText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
name: Purpleberry Shake

description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Thunder Fist</style></link> this game, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Masa, Crashing Thunder</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
flavorText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his training—he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.
name: Thunder Fist

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1
name: Conchologist

description: When I’m summoned or you destroy me, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned or you destroy me, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
name: Hexplosive Minefield

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Double my Power and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
flavorText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview
name: Earthshaker

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: The mechs and yordles were bruised, battered, beaten. Then a clarion call sounded, granting them new steam, new life: Doot doot!
name: Trumpetecher

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.
name: Twisted Catalyzer

description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Ricochet

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
An ally Strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Siphoning Strike

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavorText:
"As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
-------
"Word of Azir's return has spread across the deserts, from Shurima to the world beyond. I have ensured that myself."
name: Dunekeeper

description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
name: Chronoshift

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Centuries</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.
name: The Clock Hand

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Sai Scout

description: I cost 1 less for each time an ally attacked this game.
descriptionRaw: I cost 1 less for each time an ally attacked this game.
flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
name: Sandstone Chimera

description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck for 10+ damage in one strike.
flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3 less. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
name: Inner Sanctum

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
name: Emperor's Dais

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Waking Sands</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavorText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."
name: Treasure Seeker

flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
name: Ruin Runner

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."
name: Profiteer

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
name: Sandcrafter

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've dealt 10+ damage.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.
name: Xer'sai Caller

description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks SpellShield.
flavorText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."
name: Soothsayer

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description:
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir
name: Scrying Sands

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Baccai Reaper

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 12+ allies or landmarks.
flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir

description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia
name: Dragonguard Lookout

description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +4|+4.
flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.
name: Kadregrin the Infernal

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."
name: Dragonguard Lieutenant

description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+1 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
name: The Grand Plaza

description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook
name: Mageseeker Inciter

description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.
name: Stand Alone

description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
name: Unyielding Spirit

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
name: Brightsteel Protector

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Tough.
flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.
name: Chain Vest

description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian Ensign
name: Radiant Guardian

levelupDescription: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied <link=card.senna><style=AssociatedCard>Senna, Sentinel of Light</style></link> die<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna, Sentinel of Light die.
flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
name: Lucian

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
name: Single Combat

description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
name: Fleetfeather Tracker

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
name: Prismatic Barrier

description: Give allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!"
name: For Demacia!

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire
name: Vanguard Squire

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
name: Riposte

description: The first time I see an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> die, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I see an allied Lucian die, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
name: Cithria of Cloudfield

description: Give two allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give two allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
name: Back to Back

levelupDescription: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
name: Lux

levelupDescriptionRaw: I've killed 2 enemies.
flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."
name: Fiora

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other battling allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other battling allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
name: Cithria the Bold

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen
name: Brightsteel Formation

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard
name: Vanguard Bannerman

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”
name: Tianna Crownguard

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal
name: Trueshot Barrage

description: Transform a follower into another follower.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into another follower.
flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"
name: Hextech Transmogulator

description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
descriptionRaw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.
name: Plaza Guardian

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've planted 15+ Poison Puffcaps.
flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."
name: Teemo

description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
name: Mushroom Cloud

description: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Illegal Contraption</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon an Illegal Contraption.
flavorText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan Philanthropist
name: Unlicensed Innovation

flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.
name: Academy Prodigy

flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.
name: Daring Poro

description: When you cast a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"
name: Puffcap Peddler

description:
To play, spend all your mana.
<style=Variable>Deal that much to a unit.</style>
descriptionRaw:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite Experimenter
name: Thermogenic Beam

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've targeted enemy units 8+ times.
flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"
name: Ezreal

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
name: Get Excited!

levelupDescription: I see your hand is empty.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see your hand is empty.
flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
name: Jinx

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemy units.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all enemy units.
flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper
name: Chempunk Shredder

description:
To play me, discard 1.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, discard 1.
Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"
name: Zaunite Urchin

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies for each spell obliterated.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies for each spell obliterated.
flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."
name: Corina Veraza

description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Progress Day!

description: Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
name: Mystic Shot

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Clump of Whumps

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."
name: Boomcrew Rookie

description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0.
flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...
name: Subpurrsible

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Set an ally to 4|4.
flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Suit Up!

description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"
name: Gotcha!

description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook
name: Insightful Investigator

description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.
name: Veteran Investigator

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
name: The University of Piltover

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me all keywords on allies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
flavorText: "I'm just like you, only better."
name: Mechanized Mimic

description: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor
name: Aftershock

flavorText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."
name: Armed Gearhead

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor
name: Hexcore Foundry

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
name: Sneaky Zeebles

description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
name: Divergent Paths

flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Fledgling Stellacorn

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
name: Zoe

description: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
descriptionRaw: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
name: Arbiter of the Peak

flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
name: Startled Stomper

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it Overwhelm this round.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
name: Zenith Blade

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
name: Solari Shieldbearer

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Pale Cascade

flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
name: Whiteflame Protector

flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.
name: Porofly

flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
name: Sparklefly

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an enemy spell played this game.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
name: Spell Thief

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
name: Sun Guardian

description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
name: Astral Protection

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
name: Gift Giver

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've activated Daybreak 5+ times.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
name: Leona

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've activated Nightfall 4+ times.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
name: Diana

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
name: Solari Sunforger

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
name: Targon's Peak

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
name: Tyari the Traveler

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
name: Lunari Duskbringer

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
name: Lunari Priestess

description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
name: Starry Scamp

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
name: Mountain Sojourners

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Silence a unit this round.
flavorText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka
name: Hush

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
name: Spacey Sketcher

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
name: Solari Soldier

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
name: Dreadway Deckhand

description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the Strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
name: Hired Gun

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>, or a random 1 cost ally from any faction.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Powder Keg, or a random 1 cost ally from any faction.
flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.
name: Petty Officer

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me two random keywords.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me two random keywords.
flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
name: Plunder Poro

flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."
name: Prowling Cutthroat

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
name: Warning Shot

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescription: When I've seen you attack 4 times<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When I've seen you attack 4 times.
flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
name: Miss Fortune

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> 7 times on random enemies.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Cannon Barrage 7 times on random enemies.
flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"
name: Riptide Rex

description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 from the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Draw 1 from the enemy deck.
flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
name: Black Market Merchant

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune
name: Monkey Idol

description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.
name: Sheriff Lariette Rose

description:
<link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw a card.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw a card.
flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"
name: Abyssal Eye

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
name: Jaull Hunters

description: When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, give me Elusive and stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me.
levelupDescription: When you've cast 6+ spells this game<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you've cast 6+ spells this game.
flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
name: Fizz

description: Summon a random 1 cost follower from any faction.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 1 cost follower from any faction.
flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jailbreak

description:
Draw a card from the enemy deck.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 more.
descriptionRaw:
Draw a card from the enemy deck.
Plunder: Draw 1 more.
flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
name: Pilfered Goods

description: When I Level Up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I Level Up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you are Deep.
flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
name: Nautilus

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.
name: Jagged Taskmaster

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"
name: Devourer of the Depths

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.
name: Jagged Butcher

description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."
name: Crackshot Corsair

description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
name: Pocket Aces

description: When I'm summoned, create a random 1 cost unit from any faction and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random 1 cost unit from any faction and grant it Scout.
flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
name: Island Navigator

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
name: The Slaughter Docks

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
name: Lounging Lizard

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
name: Boxtopus
