description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
name: Fortune Croaker

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
name: Crusty Codger

description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
name: Boomship

description:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
name: Wiggly Burblefish

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in hand, deck, or play.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in hand, deck, or play.
flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
name: The Howling Abyss

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 9</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 9: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
name: Frozen Thrall

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall and advance it 2.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Watcher</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
name: Lissandra

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
name: Draklorn Inquisitor

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
name: Ice Shard

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
name: Three Sisters

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
name: Ember Maiden

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
levelupDescription: When you've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds this game<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds this game.
flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
name: Sejuani

description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
name: Ursine Spiritwalker

flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
name: Ruthless Raider

description: Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +4|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Fury of the North

description:
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
Play: Draw a Sejuani.
flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: The Tuskraider

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.
name: Flash Freeze

description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper
name: Elixir of Iron

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"
name: Babbling Bjerg

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand another random 1 cost Poro from any region.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand another random 1 cost Poro from any region.
flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder
name: Lonely Poro

description: Grant two allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant two allies +0|+3.
flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere
name: Bloodsworn Pledge

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.
name: Icevale Archer

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”
name: Scarmother Vrynna

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
descriptionRaw: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.
name: Rimefang Wolf

description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen
name: Omen Hawk

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum
name: Brittle Steel

description: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."
name: Starlit Seer

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Tavernkeeper
name: They Who Endure

description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Vrynna, Scarmother
name: Unscarred Reaver

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Frostbite the Strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: You <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 5+ enemies<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crystal Arrow</style></link> on top of deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You Frostbite 5+ enemies. When I level up, create a Crystal Arrow on top of deck.
flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."
name: Ashe

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."
name: Avarosan Hearthguard

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite 2 enemies.
flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia
name: Harsh Winds

description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
name: Avarosan Trapper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"
name: Kindly Tavernkeeper

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma
name: Ritual of Renewal

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit.
flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
name: Will of Ionia

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
name: Greenglade Duo

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies in hand +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies in hand +1|+1.
flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.
name: Greenglade Elder

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You Stun or Recall 5+ units.
flavorText: "Death is like the wind..."
name: Yasuo

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
name: Navori Bladescout

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes." - Saga of the First Lands
name: Windfarer Hatchling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”
name: Inspiring Mentor

flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
name: The Empyrean

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand
name: Minah Swiftfoot

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
name: Spirit's Refuge

flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."
name: Kinkou Lifeblade

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create a random spell in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Create a random spell in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You're Enlightened.
flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
name: Karma

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
name: Sparring Student

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem
name: Herald of Spring

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Hasegi!"- Yasuo
name: Steel Tempest

description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavorText: No.
name: Deny

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
name: Kinkou Wayfinder

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
name: Emerald Awakener

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
name: Yone, Windchaser

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.
name: Shadow Assassin

description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.
name: Flower Child

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Our allies have been supported 3+ times.
flavorText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"
name: Lulu

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."
name: Fae Guide

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house
name: Homecoming

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
name: Monastery of Hirana

flavorText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...
name: Tasty Faefolk

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> and +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!
name: Young Witch

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Double my Power.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Double my Power.
flavorText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.
name: Swole Squirrel

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu
name: Pix!

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
name: Vaults of Helia

description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavorText: "Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!" - Recovered journal
name: Overgrown Snapvine

description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
name: Neverglade Collector

description: When I'm summoned, give other allied Spiders +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allied Spiders +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise
name: Frenzied Skitterer

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round Start: You have 3+ other Spiders.
flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.
name: Elise

levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen 6+ units die.
flavorText:
Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...
name: Thresh

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.
name: Brood Awakening

description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless Vindicator
name: Glimpse Beyond

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Escaped Abomination</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.
name: Cursed Keeper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.
name: Spectral Matron

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"
name: Hapless Aristocrat

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Revive me next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...
name: The Undying

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat
name: Vile Feast

flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.
name: Arachnoid Horror

description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.
name: Phantom Prankster

flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.
name: Sinister Poro

description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.
name: Crawling Sensation

description: If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: If an ally died this round, deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista
name: Black Spear

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.
name: Commander Ledros

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.
name: Chronicler of Ruin

levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen 3+ allies die.
flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.
name: Kalista

description: Deal 1 to all enemy units. Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemy units. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.
name: Withering Wail

description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.
name: Atrocity

description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, revive the Strongest dead allied champion.
flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?
name: The Rekindler

description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh
name: The Box

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.
name: Wraithcaller

description: Kill ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Kill ALL units.
flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.
name: The Ruination

description: To play me, kill an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally.
flavorText: You are what you eat.
name: Ravenous Butcher

description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.
name: Haunted Relic

description: Revive the 6 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> allies that died this game and grant them <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Revive the 6 Strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.
name: The Harrowing

description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
name: Decimate

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
name: Basilisk Rider

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.
name: Crowd Favorite

flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.
name: Legion Rearguard

description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
name: Noxian Guillotine

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
name: Kato The Arm

description: When I survive damage, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"
name: Crimson Disciple

flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
name: Trifarian Assessor

levelupDescription: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Jericho Swain
name: Darius

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Jericho Swain
name: Legion Saboteur

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
name: Katarina

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
name: Guile

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Replace your hand with <link=card.Devastate><style=AssociatedCard>Decimate</style></link>s.
descriptionRaw: Play: Replace your hand with Decimates.
flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.
name: Captain Farron

description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
name: Blood for Blood

description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
flavorText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Reckoning

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise
name: House Spider

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus three times.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus three times.
flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
name: The Leviathan

description: Deal 3 to an ally unit to deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an ally unit to deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain
name: Noxian Fervor

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally unit to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally unit to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."
name: Imperial Demolitionist

flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
name: Iron Ballista

description: <link=vocab.Nexus Strike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescription: When we've done 12 non-combat damage this game<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When we've done 12 non-combat damage this game.
flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
name: Swain

description: Deal 2 to an enemy unit and 1 to their Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy unit and 1 to their Nexus.
flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain
name: Death's Hand

description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Ravenous Flock

description: I only take damage from enemy units with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: I only take damage from enemy units with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
name: Armored Tuskrider

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Noxkraya Arena

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
name: Brutal Hunter

description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Scorched Earth

description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
name: Sharpened Resolve

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
name: Basilisk Bloodseeker
